questions.question_text: "breakthrough" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A significant and sudden advance or discovery
A minor correction in a report
A delay caused by technical issues
A meeting to review employee attendance
questions.example_sentence: Several speakers discussed recent breakthroughs in renewable energy technology.
questions.explanation:
大きな進展・飛躍的発見
小さな修正
技術的遅延
勤怠確認会議

questions.question_text: "agenda" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A list of topics to be discussed at a meeting
questions.example_sentence: The agenda included sessions on leadership and digital transformation.
questions.explanation:
議題・アジェンダ
罰金
広告
企業理念

questions.question_text: "facilitate" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To make a process easier or more efficient
questions.example_sentence: The new software is designed to facilitate communication between departments.
questions.explanation:
容易にする・促進する
参加を制限する
提案を却下する
行動監視

questions.question_text: "initiative" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A strategic plan or action to address an issue
questions.example_sentence: A major initiative presented at the forum focused on reducing production waste.
questions.explanation:
戦略的取り組み
作業量の一時減少
安全検査
雑談

questions.question_text: "implementation" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The act of putting a plan into practice
questions.example_sentence: Several companies shared challenges related to the implementation of AI-based tools.
questions.explanation:
実行・導入
リスク評価
給与交渉
イベント中止
